comments.body: Since this is compiling c source files, you need to compile it for different versions of `vc`. See http://conda-forge.github.io/docs/buildwin.html#vc-features. Let me know if you need help

Those instructions are pretty Python-oriented and this recipe has nothing to do with Python, so I took a guess and added both the features and build blocks but no python dependency (https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/pull/3207/commits/2fa59b80bc35c2b4d21e7e99d60ab6234641c4eb). Was that right?
